# k8s_canaries_flanksource_com_topology_v1_manifest (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "k8s_canaries_flanksource_com_topology_v1_manifest" "example" {
  metadata = {
    name      = "some-name"
    namespace = "some-namespace"
  }
}
```
